q: ( Reuters)- Chrysler is working to refinance what its chief executive characterized as`` shyster loans'' that the Obama administration extended as part of a bailout to keep the automaker from collapse in 2009. I want to pay back the shyster loans, Sergio Marchionne said at an industry conference, using a derogatory term for an unprincipled lawyer or politician.`` Pay back the loans, get those out and then take( the company) public.'') which

On Saturday, he wrote, I was met outside by many Egyptians, who asked if the museum was safe and what they could do to help. The people were happy to see an Egyptian official leave his home and come to Tahrir Square without fear; they loved that I came to the museum. Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept.`` No state needs to declare bankruptcy,'' Bill Lockyer said, The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't. Bill Lockyer 's point-- a valid one-- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments that lack the capacity to repay their debts. editor of a top-selling tabloid newspaper. Andy Coulson denies any knowledge of the hacking, but admitted he'd committed a cardinal sin for a back room operator- he became the story. Andy Coulson said continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in his role as Downing Street communications chief.`` I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on.''

She plays with animals, obviously. And vodka's kind of a hobby, she deadpans, as David Letterman whips out two glasses of Grey Goose on the rocks. Cheers! 5.
